name: made on a train (Christmas)
description:
This game was made on a train ride over 2 hours. Therefore it is not polished, I plan on releasing a polished version soon. I think that this was a simple but fun game made under time constraints and is a great thing to share.

How to play!

Press space to make the Christmas tree fall.

Try land it in a pot.

If you miss you need to reset the game.

Polished version coming out soon!

P.S I'm accepting name suggestions. : )
